argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_absf | |- abs : CC --> RR |
| 2 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 3 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( abs : CC --> RR /\ RR C_ CC ) -> abs : CC --> CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- abs : CC --> CC |
| 5 |  | #P_abs2difabs | |- ( ( z e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( abs ` ( ( abs ` z ) - ( abs ` A ) ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( z - A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_cn1lem | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. CC ( ( abs ` ( z - A ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( abs ` z ) - ( abs ` A ) ) ) < x ) ) |
